snippet.title: ESCAPE CONDITION Story Trailer | Wishlist on Steam
snippet.description:
Get or Wishlist Escape Condition in Early Access here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1391580/Escape_Condition/?beta=0

Escape Condition is a solo developed First-person Shooter for PC that combines gunplay with RPG abilities. Choose the fate of AI one branch at a time - the world changes alongside your character with a unique modular campaign system.

Test rig: 
MOBO: X570 TUF-Gaming Plus
GPU: Radeon RX 5600 XT
CPU: Ryzen 3950x 

Site          http://escapecondition.com

#PC #unrealengine  #indiegame #cyberpunk #dystopian
